pdf.body:
<#if subsidiary.mainaddress_text?has_content >
				${subsidiary.mainaddress_text}

			<#elseif companyInformation.mainaddress_text?has_content >
				${companyInformation.mainaddress_text}
	
			</#if>
			<#if subsidiary.fax?has_content >
				Phone: ${subsidiary.fax}

			<#elseif companyInformation.fax?has_content >
				Phone: ${companyInformation.fax}
	
			</#if>
			<#if subsidiary.email?has_content >
				Email: ${subsidiary.email}
			<#elseif companyInformation.email?has_content >
				Email: ${companyInformation.email}
			</#if>
		
		
			
				

					TO
					
						<#if record.billaddress?length != 0 >
							${record.billaddress}

						<#elseif record.entity.address?length != 0 >
							${record.entity.address}

						</#if>
						<#if record.subsidiary.fax?has_content >
							Phone: ${record.subsidiary.fax}

						<#elseif record.companyInformation.fax?has_content >
							Phone: ${record.companyInformation.fax}	

						<#elseif record.entity.fax?has_content >
							Phone: ${record.entity.fax}
						
						</#if>
						<#if record.subsidiary.email?has_content >
							Email: ${record.subsidiary.email}
						<#elseif record.companyInformation.email?has_content >
							Email: ${record.companyInformation.email}
						<#else>
							Email: ${record.entity.email}
						</#if>
					
				
			
		
	



	

	${record.salesrep@label}
	${record.otherrefnum@label}
	${record.terms@label}
	${record.shipdate@label}
	${record.shipmethod@label}
	
	

	${record.salesrep}
	${record.otherrefnum}
	${record.terms}
	${record.shipdate}
	${record.shipmethod}
	


<#if record.item?has_content>

	<#function tablerow index>
	  <#if (index % 2) == 0>
		<#return "#ffffff" />
	  <#else>
		<#return "#eeeeee" />
	  </#if>
	</#function>

	
	
	
		

		 
		Item
		Description
		Quantity
		UOM
		Unit Price
		Amount
		
	

	<#list record.item as item>
	

	${item?counter}
	${item.item}
	${item.description}
	${item.quantity}
	
	${item.units}
	${item.rate}
	
	${item.amount}
	
	</#list>
	
	

</#if>



	

		 
		
			
				

					Subtotal
					${record.subtotal}
				
				

					Discount/Promo
					${record.discounttotal}
				
				<#if subsidiary.country == "Canada">
				

					GST/HST
					${record.taxtotal}
				
				

					${record.tax2total@label}
					${record.tax2total}
				
				<#elseif subsidiary.country == "United States">
				

					${record.taxtotal@label}
					${record.taxtotal}
				
				</#if>				
				

					Freight
					<#assign freight = (record.shippingcost + record.handlingcost) >
					${freight}
				
				

					${record.total@label}
					${record.total}
				
			
		
	
	

		
			
				
Memo:

${record.memo}
			
		
		 
	
	

		Thank you for your business!
